comments.body: Obviously, bracers, gloves should have a separate slot for armor in the inventory.

I think this might be a little underpowered, since players would go to all that work just to get a longer range chorus fruit, but I like the idea and I'll vote in the hopes that more ideas can be generated in the comments.
In my opinion, one of the best side effects of this block is giving a use for amethyst
Also it would be cool if you could retexture every single block, in the game with the art block. Very good idea :D.
yeah
This would be great for making smaller-sized fossils and creepier nether houses! I hope this gets added.
good idea
I thought its called "Hanging Root" for a reason
Sería buena idea que de ellos se obtuviera miel de Maple.
I dont think a y axis fence post would look okay. However, I do thing that an x axis fence post compatability would be dope.
This is for any emerald gear
Yes just yes
No just no
It probably wouldn’t be better than dim and but it would be better than iron

That would be amazing to have on Minecraft.
Maybe It could add new combat animations making fighting more dynamic, It also gives players more freedom to do things like role playing and world building.Amazing idea

scythes and gauntlets would be interesting too, gauntlets would add a new armor slot or could be equipped in place of a shield, having the option of being used for defense while you crouch and scythes would be a wepon/tool
Maybe enchantments too such as quick shooting or multi shot just like the crossbow.
sleep darts would be cool for capturing mobs or farm animals.
They could be stronger than iron against swords and axes but weaker against arrows.
Uh, don't you mean green dye?
What on earth does a shield do to stop you from burning
snowblocking will negate knockback of snowball

Re: MajorasYamask
A shield does nothing to stop you from burning which is why I mentioned the fire protection enchantment.

Hello, this appears to be a non-English post. Below you will find a transcription of the topic being discussed.  

 

Title: “Add wool slabs, stairs and concrete slabs and stairs to Myrra!”  

 

Text: “Add wool slabs, stairs and concrete slabs and stairs to Myrra!” 

- Translated by Admin

マイクラのカーペットブロックは積めることができたら、それがいいと思います。今ま、もっとハーフブロックが要ります。

私の日本語が上手ないから、すみません。

Also, to the admin that translated the post, it appears that the translation software used got confused by "maikura", which is the Japanese shorthand for Minecraft, kind of like how many people call Minecraft "MC".
りー
やたにや

色付きコンクリート階段ブロック　or 　階段ブロックにカーペットを敷けるようにしてほしい
かなり長い間待っています

Same with shears, Would really shred through their durability but what's essentially a big pair of scissors should definitely do more in combat than your bare hands. Also feel like the stick damage should be less, Just barely better than punching barehanded; Not something you'd ever choose to use but just a tad better than nothing should you be caught off guard with a tad of clutter in your inventory. Maybe extend this to bones and bamboo as well?
I've always felt like hitting a zombie with a stick should be slightly more effective...
Maybe give it a chance to break each time you hit a mob.

Amethyst is the awesome purple transparent crystal mineral which is birthstone of Aquarius
Shakira, Chloie Grace are born under this stone. some believe that Amethyst is a natural tranquiliser, relieving stress and strain, soothes irritability, balances mood swings, dispels anger, rage, fear and anxiety. Alleviates sadness and grief, and dissolves negativity. This would make a great potion to close 2020!

This will already be a thing in the next minecraft update. As for crafting it into armour, I can't see this happening as this game is already far easier than it used to be without another tier of armour. I would be fine adding it to diamond armour like netherite is for a specific new feature, but it would have to be that you cannot have both at once. This would make players choose between them assuming that they are well balanced. Right now, your late-game tools always look the same, without much room for experimentation. The only choices I've ever had to make is mending/infinity on a bow, and sharpness/smite on a sword. I think more variation is needed. If this is added for armour, it would be nice to see other players wearing something other than netherite from time to time.

 

Here is an image of amethyst in the current snapshots. You can only currently access this feature if you are using Java Edition, by clicking 'Latest Version' at the bottom and changing it to 'Latest Snapshot'.
You can only mine it with Diamond pickaxe with efficiency 1or over or netheright pickaxe
That would be cool but it could be worse than Netherite still since it is hard to get to the nether

Having amethyst armor and tools isn't a bad idea, but making it stronger than diamond won't make sense since amethyst is not as hard as diamonds, maybe its mike quartz or hard glass but not as diamonds

It would be cool to see an obsidian brick or something like it.
Would be cool for prison builds
With its blast resistance and since it's hard to mine.
I think it should be just slabs, stairs, and polished obsidian slabs and stairs.
I had an idea or that too, but a lot more like buttons and doors similar too iron doors. I like it.

I agree though wouldn't mind seeing the texture change as well to make it more appealing maybe something more like Fire Obsidian to give it a neat look. This also could make a relatable mechanic were leaving an obsidian block exposed to the overworld surface for a long time would turn it to crying obsidian, and following rules of copper a wax layer to protect it in builds.
what dose that even mean?
Using Sticks on Armor Stands could add the arms
That's a great idea! For example, you want to store a sword, pickaxe, axe, shovel, hoe, bow, or other items/blocks you can store in Creative.
Rabbits would be nice, but how would you tame them, and what would be their specialty? Same for turtles or anything else.
How in the world do we not have locked doors yet? At least password protected! It’s so easy to make, and would be SO MUCH MORE HELPFUL!!
I agree to disagree with your idea. There are already redstone contraptions that open doors it you put in the correct renamed item.

Made a related wish idea for password protected chest. What I noted in mine was that the chest couldn't be destroyed if password protected. How would you stop me gaining entry into your house as I could just destroy a wall bypassing door password security?
Yes! I think it should take about the same time as it would to break the block, because that's sort of what you're doing, just on the outside of the block not the whole thing.
I agree! Same with making dirt paths!
Do the same with shearing sheep and plowing the land.
Good. Rabbits should like it too.
It should start the same size as a pumpkin plant does, but then grow in size to a player head and then a block
It could also be peeled (leafed?) and a layer would be taken off the plant, giving lettuce leaves
Cabbage can be dropped by goats too, the number is 0-2
